verbs.description: [ARG1: ice] [V: raids] [ARG0: north texas company] arrests 150 suspected undocumented immigrants federal immigration authorities raided a north texas vehicle trailer manufacturing plant and detained more than 150 undocumented workers as part of an ongoing criminal investigation into the company load trail dallas yareli mendoza katrina berger
